price: Yeye ndiye anaye anzisha na ndiye anaye rejeza tena,
footnotes: Ni Yeye peke yake ndiye Mwenye kuanza kuumba, na kisha ni Yeye anaye rejeza tena,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
